name: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Adrenal Disorders

concept.display: Injury of adrenal gland with open wound into abdominal cavity (disorder)

Adrenal insufficiency due to adrenal metastasis (disorder)

Hyperaldosteronism co-occurrent with hyperplasia of the adrenal cortex (disorder)

Primary immunodeficiency with natural killer cell deficiency and adrenal insufficiency (disorder)
Inherited isolated adrenal insufficiency due to partial cytochrome P450 family 11 subfamily A member 1 deficiency (disorder)
